posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a n172 Fred Mann and a MC Robinson. 

Mann is ordinarily not a tough card.  However,  this is a very hard to find team change variation that "portrays" him as a member of the Hartfords team. 

Card has a stain of some sort, but has a really nice image. 

Robinson is more of a common player,  but has a good image despite its condition issues. 

Mann is $400 obo
Robinson is $85 OBO sold

Please send offers, questions, comments to [url]tlwise12@aol.com[/url]. 

Thanks
Travis
What grade did sgc give the Robinson?
The Robinson is a sgc 10, but was sold late last night.
